wizard.name: Mobile Web Application Project
wizard.description: Creates a new Symbian WRT application project using one of the provided templates

projectTemplate.name: Minimal Project
projectTemplate.description: This wizard generates an empty widget project with a minimal Info.plist, html,css and js.

projectTemplate.name: Hello World Project
projectTemplate.description: This wizard generates a basic Hello project with a minimal Info.plist, html,css and js along with WRTKit.

projectTemplate.name: PhoneGap Application
projectTemplate.description: This wizard generates a project based on the PhoneGap library that showcases PhoneGap API usage. PhoneGap applications require WRT 1.1 or newer.

projectTemplate.name: Flickr Project
projectTemplate.description: This wizard generates an Flickr project with a minimal Info.plist, html,css and js and WRTKit.

projectTemplate.name: RSS Reader Project
projectTemplate.description: This wizard generates an RSS Reader project with a minimal Info.plist, html,css and js and WRTKit.

projectTemplate.name: Various UI Templates
projectTemplate.description: Includes templates for high-end devices from Forum.Nokia.

wizard.name: Existing Mobile Web Projects into Workspace
wizard.description: Import WRT project created in Aptana, Adobe Dreamweaver or WRT IDE

wizard.name: Application Archive (WGZ)
wizard.description: Create WRT project from deployable WGZ application archive

keyword.label: wrt, webruntime, web runtime, cwrt widget

command.description: Deploys an application to phone or emulator
command.name: Deploy Application

command.description: Adds JavaScript libraries to Mobile Web projects
command.name: Add JavaScript Libraries...

extension.name: Excluded from Mobile Web packaging marker
